about_the_game:
Vintage Dust by Rafał Trzcionka is the album used in Tales From The Arcade: Starship Murder. If you enjoyed our experimental murder mystery roguelite and would like us to create more free games - consider buying the soundtrack.




Initially I (Kuba) was planning on using one or two royalty free songs in Starship Murder. I spent days going through hundreds of tracks searching for something that would fit. I was just about to lose my mind when Witek introduced me to his brother. Rafał has been making music for years and besides the tracks he released on the internet he also has hundreds of unpublished ones. He sent me this album - Vintage Dust - that's been sitting in his drawer for a while. I unzipped the package, added the tracks to my playlist and launched the game to see if what I’ve received fits the mood. A few moments later I knew we had hit the jackpot... Now I had not 'a few' songs but a whole soundtrack to add to the game.
